The 13 Best Knowledge Base Software Solutions [2023]
Want to supercharge your customer support and knowledge management efforts? This post will walk you through the best knowledge base software solutions in 2023 to choose from.
ByJosh Brown
Mar 29
16min Read
Imagine the untapped potential that lies within your organization's collective knowledge, just waiting to be harnessed. The key to unlocking this treasure trove of information lies in developing an all-encompassing knowledge base — your Single Source of Truth.
A robust knowledge base empowers your team, customers, and stakeholders with self-service support, enabling them to find and use the knowledge they need to stay productive and propel their journey to success.
But here's the catch:
To create a truly transformative knowledge base and elevate your knowledge management efforts, you need the perfect knowledge base software tailored to your specific needs.
In this article, we'll explore the best knowledge base tools available today and guide you in finding the ideal solution to supercharge your organization's knowledge management capabilities. Get ready to unleash the power of your organization's knowledge and elevate your business to new heights!

The 13 Best Knowledge Base Software Platforms for Your Business
Now, let’s take a look at 13 of the best knowledge base tools available in 2023.
Helpjuice
Helpjuice
The top-rated and award-winning knowledge management software solution, sets the standard for creating external or internal knowledge bases.
Learn More
Zendesk
Zendesk
Zendesk features include ticket management, automation, knowledge base, customer portal, analytics, multichannel support, integrations, and mobile apps.
Learn More
Confluence
Confluence
Confluence features include team collaboration, document management, knowledge sharing, project planning, task tracking, integration, and mobile apps.
Learn More
Hubspot Service Hub
HubSpot provides a suite of tools for businesses, including marketing, sales, customer service, analytics, and integrations.
Learn More
LiveAgent
LiveAgent
LiveAgent offers a range of tools to help businesses manage customer inquiries, support tickets, and service requests across multiple channels.
Learn More
